name: Serenity (Dwclan)
description:
There's an apk that you have to basically sideload onto the Oculus Quest to play... I can probably build this into a exe and get it to work with SteamVR or something but this is for a very short class project so this isn't meant to be super polished or anything.

Assets were bought off of Unity Asset Store... I'll put links sometime in the future, I might forget though :p
